text: Karrin Margaret Taylor Robson (n√©e Kunasek, born 1964/1965) is an American lawyer and politician. Taylor Robson was a member of the Arizona Board of Regents from 2017 until 2021. Robson is a member of the Republican Party. In June 2021, Robson announced her candidacy for the Republican nomination for Governor of Arizona in the 2022 election. She lost the Republican nomination in the August primary to former news anchor Kari Lake. ==References== Category:1960s births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Arizona Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Karrin Taylor Robson
